feed.title: Category: Magento | Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

entry.title: Magerun - Command Line Tools for Magento Developers
entry.content:
I have recently been carring out a code audit on a Magento site. The site had some performance issues, and I wanted to see if there were any obvious problems.

One of the things that I wanted to check was the number of observers that were being used as there were a large number of extensions installed.

After looking for a quick way to do this I came across Magerun, which will generate a table of all of the obsevers and the methods that they are called against.

There are a lot of other realy useful things that it can do, so I would recommend that Magento Developers check it out on github
